avada_kedavra.description: Instantly kill an opponent piece. Killing the king is checkmate.

accio.description: Instantly move a piece one square towards you.

depulso.description: Instantly move a piece one sqaure away from you.

confundus.description: Instantly cause an opponent piece to move randomly to an empty square.

deprimo.description: Instantly destroy an empty tile, so it cannot be occupied for the rest of the game.

reducio.description: Shrink an opponent piece. Shrunk pieces can move but cannot capture. Counter spell for engorgio.

expelliarmus.description: Your opponents next spell will have no effect.

disillusionment.description: Target piece will become invisible for 2 rounds.

duro.description: Target piece cannot move for the next round.

engorgio.description: Enlarge a piece. Enlarged pieces cannot be captured. Counter spell for reducio.

fiendfyre.description: Capture any piece as long as it is 2 squares away. This piece dies afterwards.

finite_incantatem.description: General counter spell. Remove all spell effect on a piece.

flipendo.description: Instantly move a piece two squares away from you.

immobulus.description: Target piece cannot move for the next 2 rounds.

petrificus_totalus.description: Target piece cannot move for the next 3 rounds.

fumos.description: Target piece will be invisible for the next round.

apparition.description: Instantly moves any piece on the board to any empty square.

cruciatus.description: Target piece cannot move for the rest of the game.

confringo.description: Capture any piece so long as it is adjacent.

impedimenta.description: Instantly cause an opponent piece to move randomly one square.

imperius.description: Control the target piece for the next 3 rounds.

locomotor.description: Control the target piece for the next round.

obscuro.description: Opponent cannot see you cast a spell.

prior_incantato.description: Use the last spell performed by either side.

protego.description: Shield a piece from the next spell. Lasts 3 rounds.
